about_the_game:
Are you ready for a potato revolution? Step into the role of an extraordinary hero – a potato who infiltrates the secret base of potato beetles and other creatures feeding on delicious and magnificent potatoes to stop their sinister plan to destroy the world's potato crops!

Potatogeddon is a dynamic first-person FPS game with roguelike elements that will immerse you in fast-paced action and humorous battles. Explore procedurally generated corridors of the enemy base, collect unique upgrades, and fight hordes of enraged beetles, mutants, and mechanical creatures standing in your way. Each attempt to beat the game is a completely new experience – with randomly generated levels, enemies, and items, no two runs are ever the same!

Game Features:

  • Fast, crazy FPS action – shoot, dodge, and fight against enemies in intense battles.

  • Procedurally generated levels – each playthrough offers new challenges, unique level layouts, and items.

  • Roguelike elements – face new combinations of upgrades, enemies, and challenges with every attempt, making each run a unique experience.

  • Co-op mode for up to 4 players – join forces with friends to avoid annihilation. Defeat enemies together and become potato heroes.

  • Humorous tone and stylized graphics – a comedic approach to a serious mission combined with a unique art style makes the game perfect for solo players and teams alike.

Take on the challenge in Potatogeddon and prove that the potato is king! 🥔

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
